DIA_FishingNovize_NS54_Fishing_15_02: Did you lose some stupid bet?
DIA_FishingNovize_NS54_Fishing_03_03: Oh, I was afraid it would be awkward if someone caught me.
DIA_FishingNovize_NS54_Fishing_03_04: In one book I read about how to deal with excessive stress.
DIA_FishingNovize_NS54_Fishing_03_05: They wrote that you should reminisce about the times of your youth and get heavily into some nostalgic memory...
DIA_FishingNovize_NS54_Fishing_03_06: Well, maybe you'd better read it yourself...
DIA_FishingNovize_After_NS54_03_01: I know this book by heart! You don't have to rush to give it back.
